item.title: What Type of Fat is Used in Tallow Balm?—Understanding the Ingredients
item.description: What Type of Fat is Used in Tallow Balm?—Understanding the Ingredients Tallow balm is becoming a staple in natural skincare, valued for its ability to moisturize, heal, and nourish skin. But what exactly is tallow, and why is it used in these balms? In this post, we’ll explain the type of fat used in tallow balm, why grass-fed beef tallow is the gold standard, and how PrimalCare’s whipped formula maximizes its benefits.
